physique.description: Concerns the capabilities of the body.

strength.description: Physical power, lifting capacity, and melee impact.

agility.description: Speed, reaction time, coordination, and fine motor skills.

constitution.description: Health; resilience to damage, illness or toxins.

senses.description: Awareness; effectiveness of sight, hearing, smell and touch.

attunement.description: Connect with and draw upon various magical sources.

channeling.description: The raw amount of magical energy that can be harnessed and directed.

weaving.description: Precision, complexity, and finesse achievable with magic.

resilience.description: Fortitude against magical influence and stress.

knowledge.description: Accumulated learning, facts, and general erudition.

willpower.description: Ability to maintain attention, multitask, and persevere through challenges.

composure.description: Conceal true feelings, and maintain a facade.

empathy.description: Understand and share the feelings or perspectives of others.

leadership.description: Inspire, direct, organize, and gain authority within groups.
